comments.comment: Ahinsaka duppath minissungen padi ganna dashapalana pakayo kee dahak me rate innawada. Habai un ekekwath me gana danne naha. Ethakota moda Sinhala pakayine thopi me para ballige puthalata chande denne kadu parawal bomba parawal kala marenna asa neda. Ithin thopita kadu parawal wadina eka sure thamai thawa awurudu 50 - 100 wenakota. Anna edata thopi achhila seeyala amma thaththala daruwo bohoma lassanata kesel gas kapanawa wage kapana dawasak enawa. Ada mehema alluwata me wage 10 gunayakta wada kadu bomba genna anagathe thopi chande deela Parlimenthu yawana thopema Sinhala kari ballo katayuthu salaswala denawa. Ithin thopi palayaw e parayonta puka deegena "Meda pote denawa bateüòÖ "apita one prajathanthrawade kiyagena palayaw e gotha kariyo passe. Thopita wadi kalayak yanna kalin labei prajathanthrawade balagena hitapalla kata aragena. Ane huke moda pake Sinhala hathikare nisa me rate thiyena uthumma wasthuwa Sambuddha shasanaya ikmanin winasha wenawa
comments.author: Chandana Sukumala

comments.comment: Check karanna gatta hindai me okkoma maattu wenne ,,yako munge kate ekak bade ekak mara minissune yako .... ape army eko kollo maruneth policiye minissu maruneth me hindai atharinna epa me gema sahamulinma mewwa nathi karala danna one oba siyaludenata triwida hamudawata policiyata thriwida rathnaye pihita arakshawa labewa

comments.comment: Takaramata tupiyal 5000 ta arakku bothaleta udalu thaleta perethakame chande deela path karapu thopema Sinhala manthree thumala thamai me okkoma karanna ida deela babala wage hitiye. Thawa palayaw unta puka denna. Thopi namata Sinhala witharai. Aththa kathawa thopi ekekuta ekek nathi jathiyak. Allapu gedarata TV ekak wahanayak genayoth eda idala yanawa dewala gane ara minissunta huniyam karanna. Onna thope mahaloku Sinhala kama thopita ekai anagathayedi kadu parawal kannama wenne.
